content: #10000 Michael Stoll has already given approval to this PR; now I would like to have maintainer merge on this. The ultimate aim is to replace the big proof in Data.Real.Pi.Leibniz with one based on invoking the limit theorem
In the process I proved Bernoulli's inequality for exponent 0 < p < 1 and the concavity of x ^ p over the same â€“ the full generality is not needed for ALT and is instead in #10982
